trans-unit.source: Summit to Summit Roll of Honour

trans-unit.target: Dodaj zvezo kot lovec ali S2S

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Worldwide Summits On The Air database service.
trans-unit.target: Dobrodošli v svetovni zbirki vrhov SOTA in dnevnikov radijskih zvez!

trans-unit.source: Summits on the Air is a programme that encourages radio amateurs who enjoy hill walking and the great outdoors to take their radios with them and operate from the mountain tops.
trans-unit.target: Program "Summits on the Air" (SOTA, slov.: "Vrhovi v etru") spodbuja radioamaterje, ki uživajo v pohodništvu in gibanju v naravi, da vzamejo svoje radije s seboj na pot in vzpostavljajo zveze z vrhov hribov in gora.

trans-unit.source: An award scheme recognises those who activate the summits and also those that make QSOs with the activators. The programme can be operated anywhere in the world.
trans-unit.target: Sistem nagrad nagrajuje tako aktivatorje, ki radijske zveze vzpostavljajo z vrhov, kot tudi lovce, ki vzpostavljajo zveze z aktivatorji od drugod. Programa SOTA se lahko udeležiš od koderkoli v svetu.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the SOTA program in your area, please see the main website, http://www.sota.org.uk
trans-unit.target: Več informacij o programu SOTA v tvoji okolici najdeš na glavni spletni strani: http://www.sota.org.uk

trans-unit.source: SOTA is not inherently a competitive activity, it's about individual aspirations and working towards a goal at your own pace. However, it can be fun to see how your progress compares with that of others, hence we publish our Honour Roll on the internet.
trans-unit.target: Program SOTA v svojem bistvu ni tekmovanje. Gre za stremenje posameznika k doseganju cilja, ki si ga je zastavil sam, s svojim lastnim tempom. Vsekakor je zanimivo svoj napredek primerjati z drugimi, zato tudi objavljamo seznam največjih dosežkov.

trans-unit.source: You can use this page to perform a bulk upload of many Activator Entries at once. This page is intended for more experienced users only.
trans-unit.target: Na tej spletni strani lahko preneseš več aktivatorskih zvez hkrati. Ta možnost je namenjena bolj izkušenim uporabnikom.

trans-unit.source: If you have a large number of log entries you want to claim, this may be the fastest way of recording them
trans-unit.target: Če želiš vnesti večje število zvez hkrati, je to verjetno najhitrejša možnost.

trans-unit.source: If however you only have a dozen or less entries, it will probably be easier to use the normal Add Activation web page.
trans-unit.target: Če želiš dodati le nekaj zvez, potem bo ročni vnos zvez preprostejša izbira.

trans-unit.source: Create a CSV or TSV file containing all your entries. These can be for any number of activations. The file can be generated using a text editor such as NOTEPAD, or can be exported from many other programs, such as Microsoft Excel. The format of this file is critical to ensure that correct log entries are recorded. Click here for details of the format of the CSV file that we require.
trans-unit.target: Najprej pripravi datoteko vrste CSV ali TSV, ki vsebuje vse zapise v dnevnik. Ena datoteka lahko vsebuje več aktivacij. Za pripravo datoteke lahko uporabiš enostaven urejevalnik besedila, kot je Notepad, ali kaj bolj zahtevnega, npr. Excel. Ključnega pomena je, da se natančno držiš formata datoteke. Podrobnosti o njem najdeš tukaj.

trans-unit.source: If you are unsure what a CSV or TSV file is, please use the normal data entry page instead.
trans-unit.target: Če ne poznaš datotek vrste CSV in TSV, potem raje uporabi možnost ročnega vnosa zvez.

trans-unit.source: Press the Browse button below and select the CSV or TSV file on your hard drive
trans-unit.target: Klikni na gumb "Browse" in izberi datoteko vrste CSV ali TSV s tvojim dnevnikom.

trans-unit.source: Press the Upload File button on the bottom of this screen to transfer the file to our server and begin processing it. This may take a few seconds. Please be patient!
trans-unit.target: Za prenos datoteke na strežnik klikni na gumb "Upload file". Prenos in obdelava lahko traja nekaj sekund, zato te prosimo za potrpljenje.

trans-unit.source: There are errors in your file - please correct them and try again
trans-unit.target: V datoteki so napake. Prosimo popravi jih in poskusi znova.

trans-unit.source: Please verify the uploaded details and click Submit when ready
trans-unit.target: Prosimo ponovno preveri podatke o zvezah. Če je vse v redu, klikni na "Potrdi".

trans-unit.source: By submitting this log, I certify that I have operated within the rules and spirit of the SOTA Programme. I agree that the decision of the Management Team will be final in any case of dispute.
trans-unit.target: S potrditvijo tega dnevnika izjavljam, da sem radijske zveze izvedel v skladu s pravili in duhom programa SOTA. Strinjam se, da bo v primeru spora odločitev vodstva programa dokončna.

trans-unit.source: I understand that the scores shown on this website are for guidance only and that entries may be subject to verification and adjustment by the award administrators.
trans-unit.target: Razumem da so dosežki, prikazani na tej spletni strani, le informativnega značaja in da jih lahko vodstvo programa kadarkoli preveri ali prilagodi.

trans-unit.source: You are a Mountain Goat with points.
trans-unit.target: Z točkami si dosegel naslov "Mountain Goat".

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this QSO. The error received was:
trans-unit.target: Zveze ni mogoče izbrisati. Besedilo napake:

trans-unit.source: You are about to permanently delete the record of the chaser contact below. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Nepovratno boš izbrisal zvezo iz lovskega dnevnika. Zveze ne bo mogoče povrniti!

trans-unit.source: If you wish to proceed, press the DELETE button at the bottom of this screen, otherwise press CANCEL.
trans-unit.target: Če želiš nadaljevati, klikni na gumb "Briši", v nasprotnem primeru klikni na gumb "Prekini".

trans-unit.source: Operation complete. The response from the server was:

trans-unit.target: Oblika datotek vrste CSV in TSV s SOTA dnevniki

trans-unit.source: This facility lets you upload a large number of QSOs in one bulk transaction. You need to create a Comma Separated Variable (CSV) or Tab Separated Variable (TSV) file with the fields laid out as shown in the example below. You then submit this file, which is checked for errors before presenting you with the option to save the QSOs to your database. You can mix activation records, chaser records and S2S (summit to summit) records all in the same file. You can include multiple activations in this file but all records for each activation must be together. Each activation is deemed to end when the [My Summit] reference changes. If you activate the same summit on several days you must upload each activation in a separate file otherwise the file will be assumed to only contain a single activation.
trans-unit.target: Na ta način je mogoče prenesti dnevnik z večjim številom zvez naenkrat. Potrebno je ustvariti datoteko vrste CSV (vrednosti so ločene z vejico) ali TSV (vrednosti so ločene s tabulatorjem), posamezna polja pa so razvrščena tako, kot je prikazano v primeru spodaj. Tako pripravljeno datoteko se prenese na naš strežnik, kjer se preveri njena pravilnost. Prebrani zapisi zvez iz datoteke se nato prikažejo na zaslonu, po potrditvi pa zapišejo v bazo. Ena datoteka lahko vsebuje zveze iz več aktivacij, pa tudi S2S in lovske zveze, vendar je potrebno aktivacijske in S2S zveze iz ene aktivacije zapisati zaporedoma brez prekinitve. Sistem določi da je aktivacija zaključena, ko se spremeni vrednost v polju [My Summit]. Če si vrh aktiviral v več dneh, moraš zveze iz vsake posamezne aktivacije zapisati v ločeno datoteko, sicer se bodo vse zveze štele kot ena aktivacija!

trans-unit.source: The new prefered Version 2 (V2) format consists of upto ten fields as follows
trans-unit.target: Nova oblika zapisa zvez različice 2 (V2) je sestavljen iz največ deset polj:

trans-unit.source: [V2] [My Callsign][My Summit] [Date] [Time] [Band] [Mode] [His Callsign][His Summit] [Notes or Comments]
trans-unit.target: [V2] [My Callsign][My Summit] [Date] [Time] [Band] [Mode] [His Callsign][His Summit] [Notes or Comments]

trans-unit.source: Each field is separated by either a Comma (CSV) or Tab (TSV). Each QSO is a single record and there is one record to a line, terminated in [CR][LF].
trans-unit.target: Vsako polje je ločeno z vejico (CSV) ali tabulatorjem (TSV). Vsaka zveza je en zapis in vsak zapis je zapisan v svojo vrstico. Vsaka vrstica se zaključi z [CR][LF].

trans-unit.source: This is the callsign you used for the QSO. No spaces in the callsign please
trans-unit.target: Tvoj klicni znak, ki si ga uporabil med zvezo. Presledki niso dovoljeni!

trans-unit.source: This MUST be the full SOTA reference of the summit you where activating, as shown in the above example
trans-unit.target: Celotna SOTA referenca vrha, ki si ga aktiviral. Glej primere zgoraj.

trans-unit.source: The date of the QSO. Most date formats are accepted but be careful about USA vs. International date format. Use of International date format (DD/MM/YY) is recommended
trans-unit.target: Datum zveze. Vnos je mogoč v več oblikah, a zaradi preprečevanja morebitnih napak priporočamo mednarodni format (DD/MM/LL).

trans-unit.source: The time in UTC. Either HHMM or HH:MM will work. Use the 24 hour clock!
trans-unit.target: Čas zveze v UTC. Zapis je mogoč v oblikah UUMM in UU:MM. Uporablja se 24-urni zapis.

trans-unit.source: You can enter the frequency in MHz (14.285MHz) or pick from the following:
trans-unit.target: Frekvenca zveze (npr. 14.285MHz) ali obseg (frekvenca) iz spodnjega seznama:

trans-unit.source: The callsign of the station worked. No spaces in the callsign please
trans-unit.target: Klicni znak sogovornika. Presledki niso dovoljeni!

trans-unit.source: This field is only needed if the station was also activating a SOTA summit. This is the full SOTA reference of the summit the chasing station was activating, as shown in the above example. If there is no [Other Summit] you can leave this blank. If there is a comment then you must insert a TAB or comma to mark the field as being blank. See entries for G3NOH or GW4GTE
trans-unit.target: Celotna referenca vrha sogovornika. To polje je potrebno le, če je sogovornik prav tako SOTA aktivator, v nasprotnem primeru naj ostane polje prazno. Če mu sledi opomba, je potrebno zapisati separator (vejico ali tabulator). Glej primer G3NOH in GW4GTE.

trans-unit.source: An optional field for recording short notes about the QSO. This could include the Operator's name and location, Signal Report, QSL information, or almost anything else. , You can embed a TAB or comma in this field. If you do you must enclose the entire Notes field in double-quotes.
trans-unit.target: Izbirno polje za vnos opomb o zvezi, npr. ime in lokacija sogovornika, raporti, QSL informacije ali karkoli drugega. Če polje vsebuje separator (vejico ali tabulator, je potrebno celotno opombo zapisati med narekovaji(").

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to create your TSV/CSV file is using Excel. This allows you to arrange your log data in columns then save it as either a TSV or CSV file. Either is accepted by the SOTA program.

context-group.target: Datoteko je najenostavneje pripraviti v Excelu. Podatke vpiši po stolpcih in vrsticah v časovnem vrstnem redu, nato pa jih shrani v formatu CSV ali TSV. Strežnik sprejema oba.

trans-unit.source: Spaces in the callsigns. Our callsigns do not have spaces in them!
trans-unit.target: Presledki v klicnih znakih. Radioamaterski klicni znaki ne vsebujejo presledkov!

trans-unit.source: Date or time out of order. The input parser will show an error if the log is not in sequential order
trans-unit.target: Zveze niso v zaporedju. Strežnik javi napako, če zveze niso zapisane v časovnem zaporedju!

trans-unit.source: Errors in the SOTA reference number. Spaces in the reference, leaving off the ITU prefix, or specifying a reference that does not exist will all result in an error being reported.
trans-unit.target: Napake pri zapisu SOTA reference vrha. Presledki, manjkajoča ITU predpona ali neobstoječa referenca so najpogostejši vzrok za napako.

trans-unit.source: If an error is detected then it is shown in Red and you should then modify the file to correct the error and resubmit it. Once you get an error free report, you should carefully check that everything is correct before saving it. As soon as you have saved the data you will be able to see the effect in the various Activator tables.
trans-unit.target: Napake, najdene v datoteki, bodo označene z rdečo barvo. Popravi napake in datoteko ponovno odpošlji. Ko bo datoteka brez napak, pred potrjevanjem pozorno preveri, ali so podatki o zvezah pravilni. Takoj ko boš datoteko z dnevnikom potrdil, se bodo podatki prikazali v ustreznih tabelah in statistikah.

trans-unit.source: You are about to permanently delete the record of the activation QSO below. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Nepovratno boš izbrisal zvezo iz aktivacijskega dnevnika. Zveze ne bo mogoče povrniti!

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this Activation. The error received was:
trans-unit.target: Aktivacijskega dnevnika ni mogoče izbrisati. Besedilo napake:

trans-unit.source: You are about to permanently delete the record of the activation below. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Nepovratno boš izbrisal aktivacijski dnevnik. Dnevnika ne bo mogoče povrniti!
